scene_description_enriched: A figure, likely a farmer, is depicted in an outdoor agricultural setting. The person wears a wide-brimmed hat and a red tunic with patterned sleeves, over which a white apron or smock is worn. This apron is filled with grain, and the figure is shown scattering seeds from their left hand onto the ground. In their right hand, they hold a cloth bag, also appearing to contain grain. The background features rolling hills with trees and distant architectural structures, possibly castles or towers, suggesting a rural landscape with settlements.
